item.title: Kérastase Résistance Thérapiste offers amazing results for hair that has been over-processed
item.description: Source: L’Oréal. The Résistance line was launched by Kérastase in 1995 to provide women with superior hair care and repair solutions. Two decades later, the brand expanded with Résistance Thérapiste, specifically addressing the needs of over-processed hair. Kérastase claims that this innovation, driven by a breakthrough discovery in hair structure, harnesses the power of an ancient plant and incorporates a novel sensory experience, allowing women to achieve complete renewal of damaged hair in just one use.

item.title: Biotherm Homme releases kite surfing video in collaboration with The Dose skincare
item.description: Source: L’Oréal. Biotherm Homme, a high-end men’s skincare brand, has introduced “The Dose,” a product line designed to address the daily needs of men across four areas: feeling refreshed, energized, youthful, and charismatic. To showcase “The Dose,” Biotherm Homme has also created an immersive 360° video featuring Youri Zoon, a world champion kitesurfer, as he executes awe-inspiring stunts. Want to learn more? Experience it firsthand.
